thread.title: NBA players remember Flip Saunders

author: Nick Schwartz
title: NBA players remember Flip Saunders
text:
NBA players remember Flip Saunders USA Today Sports 8 hrs ago Nick Schwartz The Minnesota Timberwolves announced Sunday that Flip Saunders died at the age of 60. Saunders announced in August that doctors had diagnosed him with Hodgkins lymphoma. After Saunders was hospitalized in September, team owner Glen Taylor recently announced that Saunders would miss the upcoming season.
AdChoices It is with extreme sadness to report that today Phil ‚ÄúFlip‚Äù Saunders has passed away at age 60. pic.twitter.com/l8tthTocAt
‚Äî Timberwolves PR (@Twolves_PR) October 25, 2015
Saunders played basketball at the University of Minnesota, and after spending time as a collegiate and CBA coach won 654 games as an NBA head coach over 17 seasons. Saunders spent the majority of his career in Minnesota, where he led the Timberwolves to a division title in 2004.
NBA players from across the league tweeted thoughts and prayers for Saunders and his family.
My condolences to the Saunders and @Timberwolves family! Lost a great person in our fraternity way to early. So sad #RIPFlip
‚Äî LeBron James (@KingJames) October 25, 2015
My prayers goes out to #coachFlipSaunders family. This was a good man and a great coach. The @Timberwolves family will miss this man.
‚Äî Corey Maggette (@Corey_Maggette) October 25, 2015
Praying and sending my condolences to the Saunders family.. RIP Flip #GoneToSoon
‚Äî Reggie Miller (@ReggieMillerTNT) October 25, 2015
sad news about Flip Saunders. My prayers go out to his friends and family. Rip Flip Saunders
‚Äî Mario Chalmers (@mchalmers15) October 25, 2015
RIP to @Flip_Saunders ‚Ä¶ Had the pleasure to play for him and get to know him. Great coach and Person!!! My heart goes out to his family
‚Äî Baron Davis (@Baron_Davis) October 25, 2015
Sad day! Rest easy Flip Saunders‚Ä¶

Damn!!!! RIP Flip Saunders!!!! Praying for the family!!!
‚Äî Jared Sullinger (@Jared_Sully0) October 25, 2015
I am deeply saddened by the passing of Coach Flip. My condolences to his family and loved ones. #RIPFLIP pic.twitter.com/yxcJwdT0eG

Honored 2 have played for a brief time for Coach Flip. Learned a lot in a short time. So much passion 4 his players. pic.twitter.com/m0eIo2YCfh
‚Äî Thad Young (@yungsmoove21) October 25, 2015
R.I.P. Flip Saunders!
